original_text: And you also will bear witness, because you have been with me from the beginning.
korean_text: 너희도 처음부터 나와 함께 있었으므로 증언하느니라

sentences.original_text: And you also will bear witness
because you have been with me from the beginning.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 처음부터 나와 함께 있었기 때문이다.
